name: Road Trip! A soup filled adventure!
name_original: Road Trip! A soup filled adventure!
description:
Road Trip! A soup filled adventure!

Join Oliver and Theo as they try to find ingredients to make soup for one another!

This short game was put together by my friend Maggie (@MrTreeFingers), Dylan (@theprakash_), and I (@joshgarcia_3d) for the Secret Santa Game Jam! Made for Kiv/PrestonLogan! We hope you like it!
